2.「なんで キサマが ここにいるニャ？| もしかして オレの追っかけを| 始めたの: Why is Kisama here? Maybe he started chasing|me.

3.「……まあいいニャ。| ヒマしてたとこだから 話があるなら| 聞いてやってもいい: Well, that's okay. I've just been idle, so if|you have something to say, I'll listen.

4.<pc>は キャット・バルバドと|リューデという ふたりの勇士の子孫を|探してい: <pc> mentioned that he was looking|for the descendants of two brave warriors, Cat|Barbado and Lude.

5.「……ふむ。確かに キャット・バルバドさまは| オレのご先祖さまニャ。そして 我: Hmmm... Indeed, Cat Barbado is my ancestor.|And in my family, words like this have been|handed down from generation to generation.

7.「そして 永遠の地下迷宮の広間にて| ともに 祈りを捧げよ。| さすれば 海淵の: And pray together in the halls of the Eternal|Maze. Then the way to the Abyss Room will be|opened to you...

8.「もうひとりの勇士の子孫が 誰なのか| 気にはニャっていたが アヤツを見たとき|: I had wondered who the descendant of the other|brave warrior was, but when I saw him, I|realized.

9.「もうひとりの勇士の子孫は| あの ヒューザとかいう| ムカつくヤツに ちがいな: The other brave warrior's offspring must be|that infuriating Hyuza!

11.「あの 泥くさい小魚野郎のヒューザは| オレが やっつけちまったのニャー！！: I defeated that muddy little fish, Hyuza!

12.「……その出会いは 偶然だったニャ。| 旅の身空の者同士。ここで会ったが百年目。:
The meeting was a coincidence. We are both|traveling together. It's been a hundred years|since we met here. Me and Ayatsu drew our|
|swords in silence.

13.「時が止まったかのような にらみ合い。| だが ひきょうなことに アヤツは| 猫: It was a standoff as if time had stopped. But,|to my dismay, he threw matatavi at me, the|weak point of cats!

14.「オレは とろんとする 身体をふるい立たせ！| アヤツの剣を 右に！ 左に！ 華: I'm gonna get my limp body back on its feet!|To the right! To the left! To the left! To the|left!

15.「アヤツの 一瞬のスキを狙い！| キャット剣法の秘奥義 キャット空中大車輪を|: I took advantage of her momentary lapse! I|unleashed the secret of Cat's swordsmanship,|Cat's great wheel in the air!

16.「それで アヤツは ジ・エンドだったニャ。| ニャーッハッハッハッ。: And that was the end for Ayatsu. Nyah-ha-ha-|ha-ha.

17.「……というわけで ヒューザは| もう この世には いニャいが| 安心するのニャ: ...So you can rest assured that Hyuza is no|longer in this world <pc>.

18.「アヤツなんか いなくても オレが祈れば| 海淵の間への道を開くことなど 猫飯前: Even without Ayatsu, if I pray, I can open the|way to the Abyss Room. If you want, you can|pray together with me.

19.「そうと決まれば さっそく| 永遠の地下迷宮の広間へ 向かうニャ。| <pc>も: As soon as I decide to do so, I'll be on my|way to the halls of the Eternal Maze.|<pc> should come soon.

21.「<cs_pchero>が来るのが おそいんで| ちょっと奥で 狩りをしてたニャ: I was hunting a little further back because|<cs_pchero> was slow to arrive.

22.「……ふむ。| たしか 海淵の間への道が開く場所は| あっちの方だニャ。ついてく: Hm...hmm. I think the path to the Abyss Room|opens that way. Follow me.

23.「それニャあ さっそく 剣をかかげて| 祈ってみるかニャ。せっかくだから| <c: Well then, let's start praying with Sword Held|Aloft. Since we're here, it would be good if|<cs_pchero> prayed together.

24.リベリオは 剣をかかげ 祈りはじめた。: Rebelio raised his sword and began to pray.

27.「……ニャハハハッ。ダメみたいだニャー。| これはもう キサマは 王者になれない:
...Nyahahahahaha. It looks like it's no good.|I have no choice but to give up on the fact|that Kisama was destined to never become the|
|champion.

28.「……ニャッ？ オレのせいじゃないニャ！| キサマが もっと早く 王者のマントを: Meow? It's not my fault! If only you had come|to me earlier to get the Champion Cloak!

29.「そしたら あの小魚野郎のヒューザを| 殺すこともなく ご先祖さまの教えの通り|: Then I wouldn't have had to kill that little|fish, Hyuza, and I could have helped you, as|my ancestors taught me!

31.「ニャニャッ！？| なぜ キサマが ここに！: Meow meow! Why is Xama here?

32.「ちょっと 猫島に寄ったら <cs_pchero>が| オレを探してるって ネコ: I stopped by Cat Island for a while and heard|from the cats that <cs_pchero> was looking|for me. I went out of my way to find you.

33.「で？ なんで オレが| ブタネコに 殺されたことになってるんだ？: So? Why am I supposed to have been killed by a|piggy cat?

34.「確かに ちょっと前にバッタリ会って| お前と やり合ったが すぐに しっぽを巻:
Indeed, who was it that bumped into you a|while back, had a run-in with you, and then|promptly ran off with his tail between his|
|legs?

35.「ぬぬぬぬ……。うるさいニャ！| ちょっと お茶目なウソをついただけニャッ。: Shut up! I just told a mischievous lie.

36.「今は ブタネコと コントやってる| 場合じゃねえんだよな <cs_pchero: Now is not the time for you to be playing|contraptions with pigcats <cs_pchero>. You|want the Champion Cloak, don't you?

37.「オレに そんなチカラがあるとは思えないし| 無駄かもしれねえが やるだけやって: I don't think I have that kind of power, and|it may be futile, but I'll give it a shot.|It's for <cs_pchero>'s sake, after all.

38.「おい ブタネコ。| オレたちで 何をすればいいんだ？: Hey, pigcat. What are we supposed to do?

39.「ブタネコって言うの やめろニャ！| ふたりで 同時に剣をかかげて| 祈りを捧げ: Stop calling me a piggy cat! We should both|raise our Sword Held Aloft at the same time|and Say a Prayer!

40.「ふん……。それじゃ さっさとやるぞ。: Well then, let's get on with it.

41.ヒューザと リベリオは|ともに 剣をかかげ 祈りはじめた。: Hyuza and Rebelio both raised their swords and|began to pray.

42.なんと 広間の床が 光りはじめ|旅の扉が 現れた！: The floor of the hall began to glow, revealing|a teleportal!

43.「へえ おどろいたな……。| オレに こんなことが できるなんてな。: Wow, I'm surprised... that I'm capable of such|a thing.

44.「ご先祖さまの言葉には 続きがあったのを| 思いだしたニャ。: I remembered that the words of my ancestors|had a continuation.

45.「海淵の間への道は 奥深き迷宮。| 果てなき向こうに待つは 強大なる守護者なり。: The road to the Abyss Room is a deep|labyrinth. Waiting on the endless other side|is a mighty guardian. Was it.......?

46.「なんだか知らねえが ここから先は| お前がやらなきゃ 意味のないことなんだろ？:
I don't know what this is, but from here on|out, if you don't do it, it doesn't mean|anything, right? Don't worry. |
|can do it.

47.「オレは 旅の途中の身だ。| お前の帰りは 待たないからな。| それじゃ また: I'm on the road. I won't wait for your return.|I'll see you again somewhere!

49.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から|光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。: Armaments wrapped in light came down from the|heavens to <cs_pchero>.
